creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: older, exhausted looking woman with large bundle on back, wearing kerchief, rests her back against a bench and wearily leans against a Japanese bus stop pole; PL hand rests against the sign pole, PR hand is under apron to keep warm; faint background of buildings and rain
markings: LRC: (red bird shaped seal); bottom center, in pencil: [32]
signed: LRC: [Micah]; LLC, in grey-blue: [Wakabayashi]; LRC, in pencil: 1982]
title: Wakabayashi
